      It crops the image and saves it in the folder named after the user's choice
      void CropButton.cropImage(RightPanel rightPanel)
      This function is used to crop the image
      void MainFrame.frameResize(RightPanel dsktRight, DesktopPaneLeft dsktLeft)
      It adds a component listener to the JFrame, which listens for the JFrame to be resized, and when it is, it resizes the two JPanels inside the JFrame to fit the new size of the JFrame
